items.content_html: I sometimes have to convert between Fahrenheit and Celsius. The actual formula is hard to do in my head, but someone once told me a useful approximation:To convert from Celsius to Fahrenheit, double it and add 30.To convert from Fahrenheit to Celsius, subtract 30 and halve it (the reverse).For example, if it’s 12ºC, this heuristic would return 54ºF.
